data.title: Great outdoor patio
data.text: Love the outdoor patio area, comfortable seating, plenty of fans and TVs! Foods good & they have a nice Sushi menu! Salads are OK, but the quality of salads are slipping!

data.title: Great food, horrible service
data.text: I have been here multiple times. I ordered the seafood pasta. The seafood was great and I would definitely come back for the food. The service quality did not match the quality of the food. My waitress cussed multiple times, gave us the wrong food, forgot drinks, and that's just the beginning. We did complain to the manager and he gave our group a gift card and apologized. I will return, but my experience was not great.

data.title: Patio seating to enjoy the south Florida atmosphere
data.text: We travel to the Davie area a few times a year and always make it a point to stop in at Quarterdeck for the seafood.

data.title: Pleasantly surprised
data.text: Normally, I don't like chain anything, but I was very happy with the Quarterdeck. Their happy hour drinks were reasonable and my fish tacos were quite large.  All in my party were surprised at the quality of the food and the size of the portions.  Yes, the place is loud, but you need to expect that.

data.title: FUN PLACE
data.text: Fun place, great food, good service, good value. When they have the conch chowder DO NOT pass it up it's fantastic. Lots of great TV's. Great place to go with your friends and catch up they never make you feel rushed. It's our favorite stand by -- always know we'll have a great meal and a great time.

data.title: Probably won't be back
data.text: We wanted to try a new restaurant in Davie and decided to stop in to the Quarterdeck.  Bottom line: it's a sports bar type place with TVs everywhere and a typical "pub" menu.  They do offer quite a selection of sushi -which perhaps I should've tried. Hey, it's pub food - it can range from good to terrible.  I'd say ours was average, maybe slightly below.  My wife had a burger - it was cooked correctly. I had "blackened" shrimp tacos - which were very unremarkable.  Service was pretty bad.  They were busy, but our waitress walked past us a number of times without even a "I'll be right with you" acknowledgement.  We were getting up to leave when she showed up.  She was very pleasant and apologetic about the wait, but then it took another 10 minutes to get a glass of water and our drinks.  There's  many restaurant choices in the area that will probably keep us from coming back here.

data.title: Hey, they have sushi!
data.text:
I went to lunch today with my husband today to the Quarterdeck in Davie, Florida.
I was pleasantly surprised to see that they now serve sushi. I had the Dragon roll and it was outstanding. They have changed their menu and they have some really interesting items on the list. I look forward to going there one evening this weekend and try the peach cosmopolitan, it sounds great.

data.title: Ribs
data.text: They have different Specials every day. like the Full rack of Ribs with fries for $10. They offer this on one of their special days.

data.title: No Lobster on Lobster Night
data.text: Yeah, bummed out. Went for Lobster on their Thursday Lobster special night and there was none. No delivery. Instead of a backup plan like go to the market and get some, just disappoint the customers I guess. We stayed and had salad because I like the place otherwise but come on - seafood restaurant with a regular special lobster meal.... you gotta perform!

data.title: Loved it!
data.text: Huge servings! Wonderful staff (GO Natalie)! Food was delicious! Atmosphere was fun yet not overwhelming.  Thx Quarterdeck!  We will be back.

data.title: Average food, TERRIBLE service
data.text: We had an early dinner at Quarterdeck (4:00).  There were only four other tables with customers in the entire restaurant and our waitress covered two of them, including ours.  My dad had a burger which was fine.  Nothing special and nothing bad.  I had chicken tenders tossed on wing sauce and fries.  The food was fine.  I only ate half of mine because the portion was rather large.  Oh, and you do get to keep the 32 ounce plastic cup for your soft drink.  I'm a sucker for souvenir cups (and it drives my wife nuts).  Our waitress was awful.  We had to request drink refills EVERY time and I think she only came by the table a total of 5 or 6 times.  And this is with a practically empty restaurant.

data.title: It's old and dark with bar food and TV's.
data.text: It's just a sports bar with mostly fish items on the menu. Nothing special and nothing real good. If you mainly want the bar and tv's with some bar food then it's fine but if you want a meal to remember (in a good way) then pass on down the line.

data.title: Don't be in a rush
data.text: If you need to get in and out in a hurry this is not the place to go.  Service is slow on a busy night but with the right server keeping the drinks filled it is a casual place to hang out and relax.  Outside seating is available to get away from the inside noise.  Food is usually hot and the chocolate cake is the bomb.

data.title: Ok
data.text: The food was so-so. Nothing outstanding. Good deals on alcohol, not a drinker myself but friends found it a plus.

data.title: Great food, fun casual atmosphere
data.text: Quarterdeck is a great casual restaurant, sports bar. I love the outside area which is quiet and cozy. Food is great! The best hamburgers ever. If you like sushi, their tuna appetizer or salad is fantastic!  It's a great family atmosphere!

data.title: Noisy
data.text:
Great location for us, so we go here fairly often, but they crank the volume of the music or sports game to an unbelievable level. Don't come with more than one companion, you won't be able to hear each other.
Food is OK, not nearly as good as the Dania Pier location.
Good loyalty program, easy to rack up $$ off.

data.title: Exploring the Pier.
data.text: Great view, nice break from a long stay at the Pier. Our server, Vivian, was very knowledgeable and helpful.  We both enjoyed our meals and Vivian's sense of humor.  I'll be back at the Pier tomorrow for a nice fishing morning with our 12 year old Son.  Thumbs up!!

data.title: Game Day/Night
data.text: Great meeting place.  Good place to watch the games and get your fill of brew.  Wide variety of beers and appetizers to choose from.  Service tends to be a little slow but it's worth the price

data.title: Great Waitresses, Great Food. Great Music
data.text:
I enjoyed the service from the waitress. She was very knowledgeable about the menu options and specials. She was also very pleasant.

The food took a while to come, but tasted great. I enjoyed my 1/2 BBQ chicken.

data.title: This location isn't worth your time or money
data.text: As good as the Quaterdeck is on the pier at Dania Beach, this one on University avenue is not good at all.   We just ate there. Nothing was right.  The crabcakes didn't hit the mark.  The entrees were served cold.  I couldn't eat my dinner after just one bite.  My wife and Mother in Law ate their dinners but didn't care for it at all. We ate here years ago and it was not good, but since the beach location was so good, we thought we would try this location.  Big mistake.  The waiter was very nice and the Manager came by and took my uneaten dinner off the check. He offered me something else but I respectively declined and went home and made something to eat.  I told the manager very nicely that we really liked the beach location but this location didn't have it.We will never go back.

owner_response.author: Frank Z, Owner at Quarterdeck Seafood Bar, responded to this review
owner_response.text: I would like to apologize for the recent experience you had while dining at Quarterdeck Restaurant. First and foremost we take our customer satisfaction seriously and we obviously let you down. We will look into your visit. Please accept my offer to come back and give us another try as we would hate to lose you as a customer for good. We know that there are many options in and around Davie FL to dine and I know that we have one of the best there is. Please send me your address via email to qdrestaurants@mac.com so I may send you a gift certificate to dine with us again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response
